name: Bracer
description: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
24 mana, 0.1 mana regeneration and 0.2% flat base magic resistance.
5, 2 and 2 main attack damage to all Strength / Agility / Intelligence heroes respectively.
4.05 main attack damage to universal heroes.
